title: Zooey Deschanel, Jonathan Scott are boo'ed up in photos from Halloween Horror Nights
text:
CLOSE

Zooey Deschanel and Jonathan Scott (Photo: MARK RALSTON/AFP/Getty Images and Robert Hanashiro/USA TODAY)

Is it even real if it's not on Instagram?

Zooey Deschanel and Jonathan Scott have taken the next big step in their relationship, making things Instagram official Sunday. The new couple shared photos from their date night at Universal Studios' Halloween Horror Nights to the social media platform.

Deschanel and Scott joined Scott's twin brother, Drew, and his wife Linda Phan at the spooky themed amusement park.

The photos shows the couples surrounded by costumed actors with skull masks and chainsaws, while Scott holds the "New Girl" star in his arms as she has a terrified expression on her face.

"Still processing how scared I was of these people dressed in spooky masks," Deschanel captioned the photo.

"So much fun last night. That high pitched scream totally wasn’t me!" Scott added in the caption of his Instagram post. "Also happy to report....nobody got punched!"

Deschanel and Scott began dating after they met in August while filming the series "Carpool Karaoke," which featured star-studded siblings Deschanel and her sister, Emily, as well as the Scott twin, a “person familiar with the situation but not authorized to speak publicly” confirmed to USA TODAY.

"Met some new humans today," Scott shared with Twitter followers on Aug. 5, along with photos of the foursome. "We had fun. I think I’ll keep them."

The 39-year-old actress announced her split from her husband, Jacob Pechenik, in September.

"After much discussion and a long period of contemplation we have decided we are better off as friends, business partners and co-parents rather than life partners," Deschanel and Pechenik, 47, said in a joint statement to USA TODAY.

The "500 Days of Summer" star and Pechenik tied the knot in June 2015, just a month before welcoming their first child, daughter Elsie, 4. They also share two-year-old son Charlie.

description: Zooey Deschanel and Jonathan Scott made their relationship Instagram official with photos from their date night at Halloween Horror Nights.
